comments:
I have developed an EMF model. I can save files according to the EMF model properly. I also can load a saved file according to that model for the first time. However, in the same session (e.g., debug or run) I can NOT re-load that file or load any other file generated according to that model, again. 

I would appreciate youe help,

Hamid,

I need a test case, i.e., zipped up projects that I can run to reproduce the problem.  Perhaps you've corrupted your metadata, but without a test case I can't provide any help. If you attach an example, I'll have a look at it.
